entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
